Name: Pogo Stick
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Review: To quote Trader Vic, "A refreshing blend of gin with pineapple and grapefruit juice... a real romper".
History: Adapted from a recipe in the 1947-72 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide by Victor Bergeron.
Nutrition: One serving of Pogo Stick contains 198 calories
